abstract: The economy, leadership credentials and religion are among the topics to watch for in the Republican presidential debate on Tuesday night.
snippet: The economy, leadership credentials and religion are among the topics to watch for in the Republican presidential debate on Tuesday night.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. -- Mitt Romney enters the Republican presidential debate on Tuesday as the likeliest target of questions and criticism from rivals eager to slow the building sense of momentum behind his campaign.

headline.main: Five Things to Watch For in the G.O.P. Debate
